AI_QUALITY_FAILURES.reasoning: AI interactions were primarily system notifications about JIRA status changes and internal workflow automation. No AI provided customer-facing support responses that were generic, incorrect, or unfulfilled promises.

AI_WALL_LOOPING.reasoning: There is no evidence of customers being stuck in an AI loop. The customer interaction went directly to human support (Priyanka Bhotika at 13:53:23) with time to first human of 0.1 hours, indicating immediate human engagement.

IGNORING_CONTEXT.reasoning: Support acknowledged the escalation and worked on the issue without requesting information already provided. The team investigated and resolved the SSL certificate issue without asking redundant questions.

RESPONSE_DELAYS.reasoning: The ticket metadata shows max gap between responses was only 0.7 hours, and all interactions occurred on the same day (2025-11-03) within approximately 2 hours from initial response to resolution.

PREMATURE_CLOSURE.reasoning: The ticket was closed after the fix was implemented and confirmed working. Support provided a final update explaining the resolution before closure.
